page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF BECKY
page.content: I get up at 7.00 a.m., wash and clean my teeth, get dressed and have some cereal for breakfast. I go and see my pony Jumbo. I go back inside and watch TVAM for the news. Mum takes me to school at 8.45 a.m. We play in the playground playing Danish rounders if it rains we play on the computer inside. We go inside at 9.00 a.m. We go to assembly, we sing some hymns out of the Come and Praise Books. After assembly we go into class, we do Mathematics, English and reading, then at 10.40 a.m. we have a playtime. We have a game of Danish rounders - it's great fun. At 11.00 a.m. the bell rings,we go back into class and we work on the computer. We take it in turns on the computer - in between turns we read, until lunch time. At 12 a.m. we have our lunch of fish fingers,chips and baked beans and
